game.name: Two Worlds II - Echoes of the Dark Past 2 Soundtrack
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Enjoy Antaloor apart from visuals: with the Two Worlds II: Echoes of the Dark Past 2 Soundtrack! Over 40 minutes epic, atmospherically toned music will be a feast for your ears.
